transcript:
Customer: Hari anant hari katha ananta kahun hi suna

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello. Haan ji Shivam bhai.

Executive: Ji sir.

Customer: Haan, main ye baat kar raha tha abhi na maine ek buylead consume kari thi.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Bilkul just now hi wo dali thi buylead aur maine turant use consume kara hai. Ab dekho main aapko bol raha tha na matlab mere paas bilkul harif ki aati hai buylead. Bhai bilkul iska call hi na lagi bhai. Ab aap khud hi dekh lo kya hi ho raha hai.

Executive: Ji ji ji Patna ki thi.

Customer: Wo thi chandelier ki. Crystal crystal crystal jhumar ki.

Executive: Haan ji. Aapne do purchase kari hai ek to Ahmedabad ki kari hai Zahid Rafiq se. Amba chandelier ki jo call aayi thi aapne aaj purchase kari hai. Dusri ek aapke paas aaj aayi hai crystal jhumar ki NC hai Patna ke.

Customer: Haan to main abhi bata deta hu bilkul just now ki thi.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: To sunn sir.

Executive: Kya bola unhone kya bola?

Customer: Ek second rukiye aap. Haan.

Customer: Ye jo katne wali hai na.

Executive: Ji. Haan.

Customer: Ye wali maine kari thi. Abhi bilkul abhi turant hi dali thi chalo.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Haan bhai call hi na lage bande ki. Aur usse pehle wali gayi thi usme bhi bhai call nahi lagi bhai.

Executive: Theek hai. Sir ab dekho ho sakta hai abhi call na uthaiye ek baar dobara se usko na WhatsApp pe ek baar message jarur dal ke liya karo ki usse kya hai. Ho sakta hai dekho possibility nahi hoti Shivam bhai dekho hamesha hum bhi aapko call karte hai dekho aap bhi hamesha nahi available hai ki aap hamari sari calls uthao. Hai na hota hai sir kabhi kabhi network ka issue aata hai ki kabhi kabhi call nahi milti jaise maine aapko shuru mein call kiya tha to meri voice kat rahi thi fir aapne bola Sunil ji dobara se call milao ek baar. Tab aapse meri lagbhag lagbhag 10-15 minute baat bhi ho gayi properly. To ho sakta hai sir usme network ka issue raha ho thodi der mein ek baar milana. Matlab khud isliye koshish kar raha hu maine aapke jo paanch products bataye the aapne category ke wo bhi isliye sahi kare pehle. Aur main schedule kar hi raha hu aapke sath ki Monday ek baar main video meeting pe aapke sath baithunga bhi ya sari cheeze discuss bhi karunga mere ko kyuki bahut sari cheeze dikh rahi hai aapke profile mein jo mere ko aapse discuss karni hai in detailing mein sara wo sara. Bahut sara hai. To na ye sare customers ko aap WhatsApp pe leke ek baar hi hello karke apni quotations vagera normally ek baar bhej do. Ho sakta hai network ka issue raha ho kyuki kya ho raha hai abhi main aapko batau sir do teen din se ek to jo Jio ka number hai wo bahut jyada problem create kar raha hai. Matlab beech mein ya to call kat ja rahi hai network mein ja hi nahi rahi hai. Teen din se same Airtel mein bhi ho rahi hai same cheez Jio mein bhi ho rahi hai.

Customer: Bilkul bilkul.

Executive: Hai na to ek ho sakta hai ya to wo banda network ke area mein na raha ho uski wajah se hua ho kyuki jab tak usne enquiry dali hai to team ne verify karke jab forward kari hai tab tak shayad wo kahi aur ho ya network area mein na ho is wajah se ho sakta hai. Ek baar thodi der mein dobara se connect kar lena inhi ka feedback fir mere ko aap Monday bhi batana ek baar ki kya hai.

Customer: Main dobara call karunga aapko Monday puchne ke liye. Haan aap naam par main bata deta hu mostly na mere sath yahi hota hai dekho.

Executive: Sir dekho Shivam bhai dekho bilkul hoga main mana nahi kar raha hu aapko ki dekho sir is tarike ki problem nahi aayegi. Main ye nahi bol raha sir agar dekho agar aisa ho rahi hoti na tab dekho IndiaMART agar 100% buylead convert ho rahi hoti to sir main IndiaMART fir Amazon ki tarah Flipkart ki tarah commission base pe kaam kar raha hota. Lekin hum wo wala kaam nahi hai hum to bilkul ye kehte hai ki sir aap is 28000 aapne jo mere ko lagaye isse chahe aap 28 lakh nikal lo chahe 28 se aap 2 lakh ka business nikal lo sara ka sara aap hi ka hai. Hai na to wo wali baat hai ki isse sir jitni deal nikal gaya sab aap hi ki hai hum to kabhi bolenge nahi sir aapne mere ko 28000 GST diya tha nahi ji bhai aapko 130 paisa vasool karna hai ya 54000 tak hi karna hai aisa nahi hai aap jitna yaha se nikal pao utna hai aapko 365 din mile hue hai jitna recovery kar lo aapke hath ki hai sari ki sari. Hai na to wo hai us cheez ka na us is tarike se dobara se bhi ek baar karna aur maine baki jo aapke paanch products the paancho products ko maine ek to chandelier ki category banayi hai usme dal diya CCTV ki alag se ek bana di thi uski usme dal diya hai. Matlab ek plastic flower base ki alag se category bana ke usme dal diya hai. To us tarike se kyuki categorisation LED chandelier mein to dala tha ek hanging crystal chandelier ki category bana ke maine usme dal di teeno product jo hanging wale the. Okay. Theek hai na. Haan to usse matlab basically isliye dal diya maine kyuki ek category mein agar 8-10 products honge to buyer bhi sare dekhta nahi hai kyuki alag alag category is products se related aapke naam jo aapne dala hua hai product ka to usse relevant jitni product dal jaye to utna achcha hota hai ki alag alag categorisation bhi dikhega products ka aur buyer ko samajh mein bhi aayega ki ha client alag alag category mein kaam kar raha hai. Bilkul. Theek hai na to thoda sa look and feel bhi aapki profile ka thoda sa achche se rahega aur achcha bhi dikhega buyer ko to ek baar connect karega to basically wahi focus hai ki buyer aap tak pahunche. Buyer agar aap tak pahunch gaya baat karne lage us buyer ko kaise convert karna hai aapse behtar koi nahi janta hoga aapke product mein. Hai na to wahi isliye maine alag alag karwa ke category mein wo update karwa diya is cheez ko leke sir. Baki Monday ek baar 12:00-1:00 baje ke aas paas baithenge aaiye batao aapse baat karne ka convenient time kya rehta hai sir pehle half mein ya second half mein?

Customer: Shaam mein aap karna.

Executive: Koi problem nahi sir main isliye puch raha hu kyuki sir Monday rahega to kyuki aap subah subah aap bhi apna office vagera open karte ho to usme aapke paas bhi rush hota hai buyer ka. Hai na ye hai. Koi haan kyuki koi nahi main shaam mein baith ke fir ek baar baat karunga aapse baki wo feedback ka bachega jo non certified aage aapne bola uska nahi tha wo to uske liye bhi close karunga baki Monday ek baar baithte hai hum aur baat karte hai 3:00-4:00 baje ke aas paas koshish karenge video meeting pe baat kare. Theek hai sir. Theek hai sir okay Shivam bhai theek hai.

Customer: Aage malik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says buyleads are not converting to calls.

- Customer states this happens frequently.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the buyleads purchased by customer.

- Executive updated product categories for better visibility.

- Executive suggested customer to contact leads via WhatsApp.

- Executive explained possible network issues.

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss profile.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up on non-certified feedback.

- Customer will call again on Monday for updates.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, profile, categories, network issues
